interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy and the birthplace of yoga.
Japan has more than 6,800 islands and is famous for its cherry blossoms.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest rainforest in the world.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
Egypt is home to the Great Pyramid of Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
Australia is home to unique animals like kangaroos and koalas found nowhere else in the wild.
Germany is famous for its engineering, Oktoberfest, and being the birthplace of the printing press.
South Africa is the only country in the world with three capital cities.
France is the most visited country in the world and is home to the Eiffel Tower.
Chocolate, chilies, and corn were first cultivated in Mexico.
